video.title: Jewel in the Crown
video.synopsis: In the last days of the British Raj, an educated young Indian man questions his ideals as he and a British woman are swept up by the changing tides.

episodes.synopsis: In 1942, English aristocrat Daphne Manners travels to India, where she's struck by the cultural divide and meets journalist Hari Kumar.
episodes.title: Crossing the River

episodes.synopsis: When Daphne is attacked while with Hari, he and his friends are arrested for the crime. Later, Daphne discovers that the police have framed them.
episodes.title: The Bibighar Gardens

episodes.synopsis: Daphne dies in childbirth, leaving her newborn daughter to be raised by Lily. Among the British elite, only Sarah Layton pays her respects.
episodes.title: Questions of Loyalty

episodes.synopsis: When Teddy asks Ronald Merrick to be his best man, protests over Merrick's role in the Manners case spill over into the wedding.
episodes.title: Incidents at a Wedding

episodes.synopsis: After their honeymoon, Teddy and Susan return to life as usual, but the gift of a set of silver raises eyebrows in the Layton family.
episodes.title: Regimental Silver

episodes.synopsis: When Susan learns that Merrick was gravely injured trying to save Teddy, Sarah goes to visit him in the hospital, where he reveals the shocking truth.
episodes.title: Ordeal by Fire

episodes.synopsis: Sarah attends a party in Calcutta thrown by a very un-gentlemanly Jimmy Clarke. In Pankot, tragedy ends Mabel and Mildred's animosity.
episodes.title: Daughters of the Regiment

episodes.synopsis: On her return to Pankot, Sarah meets Count Bronowski and Ahmed Kassim, who are en route to visit the latter's father, a political prisoner.
episodes.title: The Day of the Scorpion

episodes.synopsis: Susan suffers a breakdown upon returning to Pankot. Shortly thereafter, Barbie herself falls ill following an eventful visit to Capt. Coley.
episodes.title: The Towers of Silence

episodes.synopsis: Sarah's father, a newly freed prisoner of war, is concerned about a cohort's shifting allegiances, especially with Ronald Merrick overseeing the case.
episodes.title: An Evening at the Maharanee's

episodes.synopsis: Sarah and her father return to Pankot, unaware of the news that a newly promoted Merrick is about to deliver.
episodes.title: Travelling Companions

episodes.synopsis: As the war ends, Lt. Peron is working on demobilization when he stumbles upon a case file that incriminates Ronald Merrick.
episodes.title: The Moghul Room

episodes.synopsis: Two years after the war, Guy Peron's return to India to oversee the transition to independence is overshadowed.
episodes.title: Pandora's Box

episodes.synopsis: Susan and Sarah Layton, Aunt Fenny and Guy Peron are caught up in pre-independence violence, and Peron reveals the full story behind Merrick's death.
episodes.title: The Division of the Spoils
